attributes.action: prevent Jacqui Smith's elevation to the House of Lords. This would be the final insult to the long suffering Redditch electorate and to the British public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is simply wrong to even consider elevating Jacqui Smith to the Lords. Paradoxically, this is not a matter of political conviction but such an action will bring Parliament's credibility into even greater question

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
